data.title: Field Notes on Syriac Manuscripts IV: Six Philosophical Manuscripts in the Collection of the Chaldean Antonian Order of St. Hormizd (O.A.O.C.)
data.abstractNote: The article describes six manuscripts (Syr. 169 – 174) of philosophical content belonging to the collection of the Chaldean Antonian Order of St. Hormizd (at present located in Erbil). As well as remedying the shortcomings of earlier catalogues that fell short of properly identifying the texts, the article seeks also to consider the production of these manuscripts in the context of the early history of the monastic order established by Gabriel Danbo.
